name: Ext_R4_Appointment_patientInstruction
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Appointment.patientInstruction for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Appointment.patientInstruction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Detailed information and instructions for the patient
element.definition: While Appointment.comment contains information for internal use, Appointment.patientInstructions is used to capture patient facing information about the Appointment (e.g. please bring your referral or fast from 8pm night before).
element.comment: `Appointment.patientInstruction` maps to R5 `Appointment.patientInstruction`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.
